hook.text: The University of Bologna was founded in 1088. Students hired and fired their own professors.

buildup.text: Medieval universities were guilds of scholars, organized like trade guilds with rules and degrees.

punchline.text: Modern universities are medieval inventions wearing modern clothes.

quiz.question: Why did medieval lectures involve reading books aloud?
options: Books were too rare and expensive to distribute to students
